title: Ep 16: Recovery & the 12 Steps
description: What are the 12 steps and how can they help you? My guest Andy Haynes shares his stories about recovery and going thru the 12 steps himself. He's wonderful and candid and you will love him. @imandyhaynes
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
